item.title: February 21 & 22, 1993
item.description: 2-21-93 Last night I drank some pretty rough 190 proof alcohol, to what point I’m not exactly certain. Basically just to get obliterated and loose my mind; and as an extra, to wake up with the hangover that doesn’t want to go away. Found out that we’re leaving CAX on the 23rd, hopefully late. If it’s late, then that means an extremely short work week, with a 96 starting on the 25th.
